career.name: Smart Tech LLC
career.title: Data & AI Engineer
description: Spearheaded the development of an AI-powered healthcare application, integrating machine learning models for accurate medical diagnosis and real-time data analysis.
Utilized advanced cloud technologies, including Microsoft Azure, Snowflake, and Databricks, to optimize data processing, ensure scalability, and streamline application deployment.

career.name: Foxus
career.title: Frontend Developer
description: Played a key role in designing and developing dynamic, user-friendly web applications using React, JavaScript, and CSS, ensuring cross-platform compatibility.
Focused on delivering exceptional user experiences by creating responsive interfaces and implementing seamless interactive features.
